response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its importance to you, I understand its worth to be $15,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $12,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially save you thousands in the long run and boost your productivity. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12500}
